content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the taylor swift dress is all the rage and i love this quick and fun garment project **this pattern includes a video tutorial 1 - 5 length options - size-inclusive xs-5x - use any weight of yarn with the additional guide - stitch chart - color inspiration including the taylor swift dress coloring - diagrams for each section to easily understand the construction** a stunning dress inspired by the iconic style of taylor swift this pattern is perfect for both beginners and advanced crocheters featuring the timeless granny stitch that is not only visually appealing but also fun and relaxing to work with the easy construction of this dress allows you to create a chic and stylish garment with minimal effort making it an enjoyable and rewarding from start to finish whether you re a swiftie looking to replicate her fabulous look or simply searching for a delightful crochet project this dress will become a favorite in your handmade wardrobe crochet hook k 6 5mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notations removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 yarn caron blossom cakes 6 61% cotton 39% acrylic 481 yds/8 0z colorway shown radiant rainbow weight 4 heavy worsted with the guide any weight of yarn can be used some suggested yarns that go with the color inspiration charts are wecrochet comfy worsted 7 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 109yds/50g wecrochet wonderfluff 8 70% baby alpaca 7% merino wool 23% nylon 142 yds/50 g hobbii cascata 9 61% cotton 39% premium acrylic 437 yds/200 g hobbii portobello 10 60% cotton 28% acrylic 12% wool 131 yds/ 50 g lion brand color theory 11 100% acrylic 246yds/100g yardage 1050 1200 1300 1400 1500 1650 1800 1950 2100 yds 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 5 cakes in caron blossom abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet stsc - stacked single_crochet 12 slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 11 sts and 6 5 row + 4 by 4 worked in the granny stitch not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 30 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 finished bust measurement 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 64 ease this garment is meant to be worn with a 3-5 inch ease skill level beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it
